subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United relied on a first-half own goal by Titus Bramble to beat host Sunderland, securing a seventh straight win that pushed United closer to a 20th title in England’s Premier League.
snippet: Manchester United relied on a first-half own goal by Titus Bramble to beat host Sunderland, securing a seventh straight win that pushed United closer to a 20th title in England’s Premier League.
